description: Primes p such that p+2 and 2p+1 are also prime.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Select[Prime[Range[1000]], PrimeQ[#+2] && PrimeQ[2#+1]&] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Mar 30 2011*)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(6200) | IsPrime(p+2) and IsPrime(2*p+1)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 08 2013(PARI) is(n)=isprime(n) && isprime(n+2) && isprime(2*n+1) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 25 2014
author: _Thomas Kellar_
extensions: Name changed and incorrect comment and program removed by _T. D. Noe_, Aug 05 2010
